00053 /**
00054  * @brief Status of Power control unit
00055  */
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * @brief Wakeup pin selection
00059  */
00060 typedef enum
00061 {
00062   PWRCU_WAKEUP_PIN_0 = 0,
00063   #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_WAKEUP1)
00064   PWRCU_WAKEUP_PIN_1
00065   #endif
00066 } PWRCU_WUP_Enum;
00067 /**
00068  * @brief Wakeup pin trigger type selection
00069  */
00070 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_WAKEUP_V01)
00071 typedef enum
00072 {
00073   PWRCU_WUP_POSITIVE_EDGE = 0,      /*!< Wakeup pin positive_edge triggered                                 */
00074   PWRCU_WUP_NEGATIVE_EDGE,          /*!< Wakeup pin negative_edge triggered                                 */
00075   PWRCU_WUP_HIGH_LEVEL,             /*!< Wakeup pin high-level sensitive                                    */
00076   PWRCU_WUP_LOW_LEVEL,              /*!< Wakeup pin low-level sensitive                                     */
00077 } PWRCU_WUPTYPE_Enum;
00078 #endif
00079 typedef enum
00080 {
00081   PWRCU_OK = 0,                     /*!< Ready for access or VDD power domain power-on reset is released    */
00082   PWRCU_TIMEOUT,                    /*!< Time out                                                           */
00083   PWRCU_ERROR                       /*!< Error                                                              */
00084 } PWRCU_Status;
00085 /**
00086  * @brief DMOS status
00087  */
00088 typedef enum
00089 {
00090   PWRCU_DMOS_STS_ON = 0,            /*!< DMOS on                                                            */
00091   PWRCU_DMOS_STS_OFF,               /*!< DMOS off                                                           */
00092   PWRCU_DMOS_STS_OFF_BY_BODRESET    /*!< DMOS off caused by brow out reset                                  */
00093 } PWRCU_DMOSStatus;
00094 /**
00095  * @brief LVD level selection
00096  */
00097 typedef enum
00098 {
00099   PWRCU_LVDS_LV1 = 0x00000000,      /*!< LVD level 1                                                        */
00100   PWRCU_LVDS_LV2 = 0x00020000,      /*!< LVD level 2                                                        */
00101   PWRCU_LVDS_LV3 = 0x00040000,      /*!< LVD level 3                                                        */
00102   PWRCU_LVDS_LV4 = 0x00060000,      /*!< LVD level 4                                                        */
00103   PWRCU_LVDS_LV5 = 0x00400000,      /*!< LVD level 5                                                        */
00104   PWRCU_LVDS_LV6 = 0x00420000,      /*!< LVD level 6                                                        */
00105   PWRCU_LVDS_LV7 = 0x00440000,      /*!< LVD level 7                                                        */
00106   PWRCU_LVDS_LV8 = 0x00460000       /*!< LVD level 8                                                        */
00107 } PWRCU_LVDS_Enum;
00108 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VDD_5V)
00109   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V65           PWRCU_LVDS_LV1
00110   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V85           PWRCU_LVDS_LV2
00111   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V05           PWRCU_LVDS_LV3
00112   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V25           PWRCU_LVDS_LV4
00113   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V45           PWRCU_LVDS_LV5
00114   #define PWRCU_LVDS_4V25           PWRCU_LVDS_LV6
00115   #define PWRCU_LVDS_4V45           PWRCU_LVDS_LV7
00116   #define PWRCU_LVDS_4V65           PWRCU_LVDS_LV8
00117 #elif (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VDD_2V0_3V6)
00118   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V25           PWRCU_LVDS_LV1
00119   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V4            PWRCU_LVDS_LV2
00120   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V55           PWRCU_LVDS_LV3
00121   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V7            PWRCU_LVDS_LV4
00122   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V85           PWRCU_LVDS_LV5
00123   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V             PWRCU_LVDS_LV6
00124   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V15           PWRCU_LVDS_LV7
00125   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V3            PWRCU_LVDS_LV8
00126 #else
00127   #define PWRCU_LVDS_1V75           PWRCU_LVDS_LV1
00128   #define PWRCU_LVDS_1V95           PWRCU_LVDS_LV2
00129   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V15           PWRCU_LVDS_LV3
00130   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V35           PWRCU_LVDS_LV4
00131   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V55           PWRCU_LVDS_LV5
00132   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V75           PWRCU_LVDS_LV6
00133   #define PWRCU_LVDS_2V95           PWRCU_LVDS_LV7
00134   #define PWRCU_LVDS_3V15           PWRCU_LVDS_LV8
00135 #endif
00136 /**
00137  * @brief BOD reset or interrupt selection
00138  */
00139 typedef enum
00140 {
00141   PWRCU_BODRIS_RESET = 0,  /*!< Reset the whole chip                                                        */
00142   PWRCU_BODRIS_INT   = 1,  /*!< Assert interrupt                                                            */
00143 } PWRCU_BODRIS_Enum;
00144 /**
00145  * @brief Sleep entry instruction selection
00146  */
00147 typedef enum
00148 {
00149   PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE = 0,          /*!< Sleep then wait for event                                        */
00150   PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFI               /*!< Sleep then wait for interrupt                                    */
00151 } PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum;
00152 #if (LIBCFG_BAKREG)
00153 /**
00154  * @brief Backup register selection
00155  */
00156 typedef enum
00157 {
00158   PWRCU_BAKREG_0 = 0,
00159   PWRCU_BAKREG_1,
00160   PWRCU_BAKREG_2,
00161   PWRCU_BAKREG_3,
00162   PWRCU_BAKREG_4,
00163   PWRCU_BAKREG_5,
00164   PWRCU_BAKREG_6,
00165   PWRCU_BAKREG_7,
00166   PWRCU_BAKREG_8,
00167   PWRCU_BAKREG_9
00168 } PWRCU_BAKREG_Enum;
00169 #endif
00170 /**
00171  * @brief Vdd15 power good source selection
00172  */
00173 typedef enum
00174 {
00175   PWRCU_V15RDYSC_V33ISO = 0, /*!< Vdd15 power good source come from BK_ISO bit in CKCU unit                 */
00176   PWRCU_V15RDYSC_V15POR      /*!< Vdd15 power good source come from Vdd15 power on reset                    */
00177 } PWRCU_V15RDYSC_Enum;
00178 /**
00179  * @brief LDO operation mode selection
00180  */
00181 typedef enum
00182 {
00183   PWRCU_LDO_NORMAL = 0,     /*!< The LDO is operated in normal current mode                                 */
00184   PWRCU_LDO_LOWCURRENT      /*!< The LDO is operated in low current mode                                    */
00185 } PWRCU_LDOMODE_Enum;
00186 #if defined(USE_HT32F52342_52) || defined(USE_HT32F5826)
00187 /**
00188  * @brief HSI ready counter bit length selection
00189  */
00190 typedef enum
00191 {
00192   PWRCU_HSIRCBL_4 = 0,  /*!< 4 bits                                                                         */
00193   PWRCU_HSIRCBL_5,      /*!< 5 bits                                                                         */
00194   PWRCU_HSIRCBL_6,      /*!< 5 bits                                                                         */
00195   PWRCU_HSIRCBL_7       /*!< 7 bits (Default)                                                               */
00196 } PWRCU_HSIRCBL_Enum;
00197 #endif
00198 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VREG)
00199 /**
00200  * @brief VREG output voltage selection
00201  */
00202 typedef enum
00203 {
00204   #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VREG_2V5)
00205   PWRCU_VREG_2V5 = 0x08000000,      /*!< VREG output voltage is 2.5 V                                       */
00206   #else
00207   PWRCU_VREG_4V0 = 0x08000000,      /*!< VREG output voltage is 4.0 V                                       */
00208   #endif
00209   PWRCU_VREG_3V3 = 0x00000000,      /*!< VREG output voltage is 3.3 V                                       */
00210   PWRCU_VREG_3V0 = 0x04000000,      /*!< VREG output voltage is 3.0 V                                       */
00211   PWRCU_VREG_1V8 = 0x0C000000,      /*!< VREG output voltage is 1.8 V                                       */
00212 } PWRCU_VREG_VOLT_Enum;
00213 /**
00214  * @brief VREG operation mode
00215  */
00216 typedef enum
00217 {
00218   PWRCU_VREG_DISABLE = 0x00000000,  /*!< VREG is disabled                                                   */
00219   PWRCU_VREG_ENABLE  = 0x01000000,  /*!< VREG is enabled                                                    */
00220   PWRCU_VREG_BYPASS  = 0x02000000,  /*!< VREG is bypassed                                                   */
00221 } PWRCU_VREG_MODE_Enum;
00222 #endif
00223 /**
00224   * @}
00225   */
00226 
00227 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00228 /** @defgroup PWRCU_Exported_Constants PWRCU exported constants
00229   * @{
00230   */
00231 
00232 /* Definitions of PWRCU_FLAG                                                                                */
00233 #if (!LIBCFG_PWRCU_NO_VDDPORF)
00234 #define PWRCU_FLAG_PWRPOR       0x0001  /*!< VDD power domain power-on reset flag                           */
00235 #endif
00236 #if (!LIBCFG_PWRCU_NO_PDF)
00237 #define PWRCU_FLAG_PD           0x0002  /*!< Power-Down flag                                                */
00238 #endif
00239 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_PORF)
00240 #define PWRCU_FLAG_POR          0x0010  /*!< Power-on reset flag                                            */
00241 #endif
00242 #define PWRCU_FLAG_WUP          0x0100  /*!< External WAKEUP pin flag                                       */
00243 #define PWRCU_FLAG_WUP0         0x0100  /*!< External WAKEUP0 pin flag                                      */
00244 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_WAKEUP1)
00245 #define PWRCU_FLAG_WUP1         0x0200  /*!< External WAKEUP1 pin flag                                      */
00246 #endif
00247 
00248 /* check PWRCU_LVDS parameter                                                                               */
00249 #define IS_PWRCU_LVDS(x)        ((x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV1) || (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV2) || \
00250                                  (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV3) || (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV4) || \
00251                                  (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV5) || (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV6) || \
00252                                  (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV7) || (x == PWRCU_LVDS_LV8))
00253 
00254 /* check PWRCU_BODRIS parameter                                                                             */
00255 #define IS_PWRCU_BODRIS(x)      ((x == PWRCU_BODRIS_RESET) || (x == PWRCU_BODRIS_INT))
00256 
00257 /* check PWRCU_HSIRCBL parameter                                                                            */
00258 #define IS_PWRCU_HSIRCBL(x)     (x <= 3)
00259 
00260 /* check PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY parameter                                                                        */
00261 #define IS_PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY(x) ((x == PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFI) || (x == PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE))
00262 
00263 /* check PWRCU_BAKREG parameter                                                                             */
00264 #define IS_PWRCU_BAKREG(x)      (x < 10)
00265 
00266 /* check PWRCU_V15RDY_SRC parameter                                                                         */
00267 #define IS_PWRCU_V15RDYSC(x)    ((x == PWRCU_V15RDYSC_V33ISO) || (x == PWRCU_V15RDYSC_V15POR))
00268 
00269 /* check PWRCU_LDOMODE parameter                                                                            */
00270 #define IS_PWRCU_LDOMODE(x)     ((x == PWRCU_LDO_NORMAL) || (x == PWRCU_LDO_LOWCURRENT))
00271 
00272 /* check PWRCU_WUP parameter                                                                                */
00273 #define IS_PWRCU_WAKEUPPIN(x)   (IS_PWRCU_WAKE0(x) || IS_PWRCU_WAKE1(x))
00274 
00275 #define IS_PWRCU_WAKE0(x)       (x == PWRCU_WAKEUP_PIN_0)
00276 
00277 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_WAKEUP1)
00278 #define IS_PWRCU_WAKE1(x)       (x == PWRCU_WAKEUP_PIN_1)
00279 #else
00280 #define IS_PWRCU_WAKE1(x)       (0)
00281 #endif
00282 
00283 /* check PWRCU_WUPTYPE parameter                                                                            */
00284 #define IS_PWRCU_TRIGGERTYPE(x)  ((x == PWRCU_WUP_POSITIVE_EDGE) || \
00285                                   (x == PWRCU_WUP_NEGATIVE_EDGE) || \
00286                                   (x == PWRCU_WUP_HIGH_LEVEL)    || \
00287                                   (x == PWRCU_WUP_LOW_LEVEL))
00288 
00289 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VREG)
00290 #define IS_PWRCU_VREG_VOLT(x)   ((IS_PWRCU_VREG_VOLT_L2(x)) || \
00291                                  (x == PWRCU_VREG_3V3) || \
00292                                  (x == PWRCU_VREG_3V0) || \
00293                                  (x == PWRCU_VREG_1V8))
00294 
00295 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VREG_2V5)
00296 #define IS_PWRCU_VREG_VOLT_L2(x) (x == PWRCU_VREG_2V5)
00297 #else
00298 #define IS_PWRCU_VREG_VOLT_L2(x) (x == PWRCU_VREG_4V0)
00299 #endif
00300 
00301 #define IS_PWRCU_VREG_MODE(x)   ((x == PWRCU_VREG_DISABLE) || \
00302                                  (x == PWRCU_VREG_ENABLE) || \
00303                                  (x == PWRCU_VREG_BYPASS))
00304 
00305 
00306 #endif
00307 
00308 /**
00309   * @}
00310   */

00313 /** @defgroup PWRCU_Exported_Functions PWRCU exported functions
00314   * @{
00315   */
00316 void PWRCU_DeInit(void);
00317 #if (!LIBCFG_NO_PWRCU_TEST_REG)
00318 PWRCU_Status PWRCU_CheckReadyAccessed(void);
00319 #endif
00320 u16 PWRCU_GetFlagStatus(void);
00321 #if (LIBCFG_BAKREG)
00322 u32 PWRCU_ReadBackupRegister(PWRCU_BAKREG_Enum BAKREGx);
00323 void PWRCU_WriteBackupRegister(PWRCU_BAKREG_Enum BAKREGx, u32 DATA);
00324 #endif
00325 void PWRCU_Sleep(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum SleepEntry);
00326 void PWRCU_DeepSleep1(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum SleepEntry);
00327 void PWRCU_DeepSleep2(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum SleepEntry);
00328 #if !defined(USE_HT32F52220_30)
00329 void PWRCU_DeepSleep2Ex(PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum SleepEntry);
00330 #endif
00331 #if (!LIBCFG_PWRCU_NO_PD_MODE)
00332 void PWRCU_PowerDown(void);
00333 #endif
00334 void PWRCU_SetLVDS(PWRCU_LVDS_Enum Level);
00335 void PWRCU_LDOConfig(PWRCU_LDOMODE_Enum Sel);
00336 void PWRCU_LVDCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00337 void PWRCU_BODCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00338 void PWRCU_BODRISConfig(PWRCU_BODRIS_Enum Selection);
00339 FlagStatus PWRCU_GetLVDFlagStatus(void);
00340 FlagStatus PWRCU_GetBODFlagStatus(void);
00341 PWRCU_DMOSStatus PWRCU_GetDMOSStatus(void);
00342 void PWRCU_DMOSCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00343 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_V15_READY_SOURCE)
00344 void PWRCU_V15RDYSourceConfig(PWRCU_V15RDYSC_Enum Sel);
00345 #endif
00346 void PWRCU_LVDIntWakeupConfig(ControlStatus NewState);
00347 void PWRCU_LVDEventWakeupConfig(ControlStatus NewState);
00348 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_VREG)
00349 void PWRCU_SetVREG(PWRCU_VREG_VOLT_Enum Volt);
00350 void PWRCU_VREGConfig(PWRCU_VREG_MODE_Enum Mode);
00351 #endif
00352 void PWRCU_WakeupPinCmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00353 #if (LIBCFG_PWRCU_WAKEUP_V01)
00354 void PWRCU_WakeupMultiPinCmd(PWRCU_WUP_Enum Pin, PWRCU_WUPTYPE_Enum Type, ControlStatus NewState);
00355 #endif
00356 #if defined(USE_HT32F52342_52) || defined(USE_HT32F5826)
00357 void PWRCU_HSIReadyCounterBitLengthConfig(PWRCU_HSIRCBL_Enum BitLength);
00358 #endif
